00205 void OPAMP_Disable(DAC_TypeDef *dac, OPAMP_TypeDef opa)
00206 {
00207   EFM_ASSERT(DAC_REF_VALID(dac));
00208   EFM_ASSERT(DAC_OPA_VALID(opa));
00209 
00210   if (opa == OPA0)
00211   {
00212     dac->CH0CTRL &= ~DAC_CH0CTRL_EN;
00213     dac->OPACTRL &= ~DAC_OPACTRL_OPA0EN;
00214   }
00215   else if (opa == OPA1)
00216   {
00217     dac->CH1CTRL &= ~DAC_CH1CTRL_EN;
00218     dac->OPACTRL &= ~DAC_OPACTRL_OPA1EN;
00219   }
00220   else /* OPA2 */
00221   {
00222     dac->OPACTRL &= ~DAC_OPACTRL_OPA2EN;
00223   }
00224 }

00266 void OPAMP_Enable(DAC_TypeDef *dac, OPAMP_TypeDef opa, const OPAMP_Init_TypeDef *init)
00267 {
00268   uint32_t offset;
00269 
00270   EFM_ASSERT(DAC_REF_VALID(dac));
00271   EFM_ASSERT(DAC_OPA_VALID(opa));
00272   EFM_ASSERT(init->bias <= (_DAC_BIASPROG_BIASPROG_MASK
00273                              >> _DAC_BIASPROG_BIASPROG_SHIFT));
00274 
00275   if (opa == OPA0)
00276   {
00277     EFM_ASSERT((init->outPen & ~_DAC_OPA0MUX_OUTPEN_MASK) == 0);
00278 
00279     dac->BIASPROG = (dac->BIASPROG
00280                      & ~(_DAC_BIASPROG_BIASPROG_MASK
00281                          | DAC_BIASPROG_HALFBIAS))
00282                     | (init->bias     << _DAC_BIASPROG_BIASPROG_SHIFT)
00283                     | (init->halfBias ?   DAC_BIASPROG_HALFBIAS : 0);
00284 
00285     if (init->defaultOffset)
00286     {
00287       offset = SYSTEM_GetCalibrationValue(&dac->CAL);
00288       dac->CAL = (dac->CAL & ~_DAC_CAL_CH0OFFSET_MASK)
00289                  | (offset &  _DAC_CAL_CH0OFFSET_MASK);
00290     }
00291     else
00292     {
00293       EFM_ASSERT(init->offset <= (_DAC_CAL_CH0OFFSET_MASK
00294                                   >> _DAC_CAL_CH0OFFSET_SHIFT));
00295 
00296       dac->CAL = (dac->CAL & ~_DAC_CAL_CH0OFFSET_MASK)
00297                  | (init->offset << _DAC_CAL_CH0OFFSET_SHIFT);
00298     }
00299 
00300     dac->OPA0MUX  = (uint32_t)init->resSel
00301                     | (uint32_t)init->outMode
00302                     | init->outPen
00303                     | (uint32_t)init->resInMux
00304                     | (uint32_t)init->negSel
00305                     | (uint32_t)init->posSel
00306                     | ( init->nextOut ? DAC_OPA0MUX_NEXTOUT : 0)
00307                     | ( init->npEn    ? DAC_OPA0MUX_NPEN    : 0)
00308                     | ( init->ppEn    ? DAC_OPA0MUX_PPEN    : 0);
00309 
00310     dac->CH0CTRL |= DAC_CH0CTRL_EN;
00311     dac->OPACTRL  = (dac->OPACTRL
00312                      & ~(DAC_OPACTRL_OPA0SHORT
00313                          | _DAC_OPACTRL_OPA0LPFDIS_MASK
00314                          |  DAC_OPACTRL_OPA0HCMDIS))
00315                     | (init->shortInputs ?  DAC_OPACTRL_OPA0SHORT : 0)
00316                     | (init->lpfPosPadDisable
00317                        ? DAC_OPACTRL_OPA0LPFDIS_PLPFDIS : 0)
00318                     | (init->lpfNegPadDisable
00319                        ? DAC_OPACTRL_OPA0LPFDIS_NLPFDIS : 0)
00320                     | (init->hcmDisable ? DAC_OPACTRL_OPA0HCMDIS : 0)
00321                     | DAC_OPACTRL_OPA0EN;
00322   }
00323   else if ( opa == OPA1 )
00324   {
00325     EFM_ASSERT((init->outPen & ~_DAC_OPA1MUX_OUTPEN_MASK) == 0);
00326 
00327     dac->BIASPROG = (dac->BIASPROG
00328                      & ~(_DAC_BIASPROG_BIASPROG_MASK
00329                          | DAC_BIASPROG_HALFBIAS))
00330                     | (init->bias   << _DAC_BIASPROG_BIASPROG_SHIFT)
00331                     | (init->halfBias ? DAC_BIASPROG_HALFBIAS : 0 );
00332 
00333     if (init->defaultOffset)
00334     {
00335       offset = SYSTEM_GetCalibrationValue(&dac->CAL);
00336       dac->CAL = (dac->CAL & ~_DAC_CAL_CH1OFFSET_MASK)
00337                  | (offset &  _DAC_CAL_CH1OFFSET_MASK);
00338     }
00339     else
00340     {
00341       EFM_ASSERT(init->offset <= (_DAC_CAL_CH1OFFSET_MASK
00342                                   >> _DAC_CAL_CH1OFFSET_SHIFT));
00343 
00344       dac->CAL = (dac->CAL & ~_DAC_CAL_CH1OFFSET_MASK)
00345                  | (init->offset << _DAC_CAL_CH1OFFSET_SHIFT);
00346     }
00347 
00348     dac->OPA1MUX  = (uint32_t)init->resSel
00349                     | (uint32_t)init->outMode
00350                     | init->outPen
00351                     | (uint32_t)init->resInMux
00352                     | (uint32_t)init->negSel
00353                     | (uint32_t)init->posSel
00354                     | (init->nextOut ? DAC_OPA1MUX_NEXTOUT : 0)
00355                     | (init->npEn    ? DAC_OPA1MUX_NPEN    : 0)
00356                     | (init->ppEn    ? DAC_OPA1MUX_PPEN    : 0);
00357 
00358     dac->CH1CTRL |= DAC_CH1CTRL_EN;
00359     dac->OPACTRL  = (dac->OPACTRL
00360                      & ~(DAC_OPACTRL_OPA1SHORT
00361                          | _DAC_OPACTRL_OPA1LPFDIS_MASK
00362                          | DAC_OPACTRL_OPA1HCMDIS))
00363                     | (init->shortInputs ? DAC_OPACTRL_OPA1SHORT : 0)
00364                     | (init->lpfPosPadDisable
00365                        ? DAC_OPACTRL_OPA1LPFDIS_PLPFDIS : 0)
00366                     | (init->lpfNegPadDisable
00367                        ? DAC_OPACTRL_OPA1LPFDIS_NLPFDIS : 0)
00368                     | (init->hcmDisable ? DAC_OPACTRL_OPA1HCMDIS : 0)
00369                     | DAC_OPACTRL_OPA1EN;
00370   }
00371   else /* OPA2 */
00372   {
00373     EFM_ASSERT((init->posSel == DAC_OPA2MUX_POSSEL_DISABLE)
00374                || (init->posSel == DAC_OPA2MUX_POSSEL_POSPAD)
00375                || (init->posSel == DAC_OPA2MUX_POSSEL_OPA1INP)
00376                || (init->posSel == DAC_OPA2MUX_POSSEL_OPATAP));
00377 
00378     EFM_ASSERT((init->outMode & ~DAC_OPA2MUX_OUTMODE) == 0);
00379 
00380     EFM_ASSERT((init->outPen & ~_DAC_OPA2MUX_OUTPEN_MASK) == 0);
00381 
00382     dac->BIASPROG = (dac->BIASPROG
00383                      & ~(_DAC_BIASPROG_OPA2BIASPROG_MASK
00384                          | DAC_BIASPROG_OPA2HALFBIAS))
00385                     | (init->bias << _DAC_BIASPROG_OPA2BIASPROG_SHIFT)
00386                     | (init->halfBias ? DAC_BIASPROG_OPA2HALFBIAS : 0);
00387 
00388     if (init->defaultOffset)
00389     {
00390       offset = SYSTEM_GetCalibrationValue(&dac->OPAOFFSET);
00391       dac->OPAOFFSET = (dac->OPAOFFSET & ~_DAC_OPAOFFSET_OPA2OFFSET_MASK)
00392                        | (offset       &  _DAC_OPAOFFSET_OPA2OFFSET_MASK);
00393     }
00394     else
00395     {
00396       EFM_ASSERT(init->offset <= (_DAC_OPAOFFSET_OPA2OFFSET_MASK
00397                                   >> _DAC_OPAOFFSET_OPA2OFFSET_SHIFT));
00398       dac->OPAOFFSET = (dac->OPAOFFSET & ~_DAC_OPAOFFSET_OPA2OFFSET_MASK)
00399                        | (init->offset << _DAC_OPAOFFSET_OPA2OFFSET_SHIFT);
00400     }
00401 
00402     dac->OPA2MUX  = (uint32_t)init->resSel
00403                     | (uint32_t)init->outMode
00404                     | init->outPen
00405                     | (uint32_t)init->resInMux
00406                     | (uint32_t)init->negSel
00407                     | (uint32_t)init->posSel
00408                     | ( init->nextOut ? DAC_OPA2MUX_NEXTOUT : 0 )
00409                     | ( init->npEn    ? DAC_OPA2MUX_NPEN    : 0 )
00410                     | ( init->ppEn    ? DAC_OPA2MUX_PPEN    : 0 );
00411 
00412     dac->OPACTRL  = (dac->OPACTRL
00413                      & ~(DAC_OPACTRL_OPA2SHORT
00414                          | _DAC_OPACTRL_OPA2LPFDIS_MASK
00415                          | DAC_OPACTRL_OPA2HCMDIS))
00416                     | (init->shortInputs ?  DAC_OPACTRL_OPA2SHORT : 0)
00417                     | (init->lpfPosPadDisable
00418                        ? DAC_OPACTRL_OPA2LPFDIS_PLPFDIS : 0)
00419                     | (init->lpfNegPadDisable
00420                        ? DAC_OPACTRL_OPA2LPFDIS_NLPFDIS : 0)
00421                     | (init->hcmDisable ? DAC_OPACTRL_OPA2HCMDIS : 0)
00422                     | DAC_OPACTRL_OPA2EN;
00423   }
00424 }
